simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a single software bus command pipe message. Checks the message and command IDs and calls the appropriate routine to handle the command.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Manages Scheduler's Schedule and Message Definition Tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function manages the contents of the Schedule and Message Definition Tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board housekeeping request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This command does not affect the command execution counter

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a reset counters ground command which will reset the Scheduler commmand error, command execution and performance statistics counters to zero.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to Enable a specific activity in the Schedule Definition Table.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to Disable a specific activity in the Schedule Definition Table.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Enable a Group and/or Multi-Group(s) Command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to Enable a single Group and/or one or more Multi-Groups of activities.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Disable a Group and/or Multi-Group(s) Command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to Disable a single Group and/or one or more Multi-Groups of activities.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to enable synchronization of Schedule Definition Table to the Major Frame Sync signal. The synchronization can become unsynchronized when the Major Frame signal becomes noisy.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Creates and sends diagnostic message packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command to send the Scheduler diagnostic message.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Updates appropriate command counters following command execution.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function updates the ground or on-board command counter or command error counter depending upon the success of the command and where it originated.

parameterdescription.para: Indicates the command was successfully performed (=TRUE) or contained an error (=FALSE).

briefdescription.para: Verifies the length of the specified message.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function determines whether the specified message is of the specified expected length. If not, an event message is generated and the appropriate command error counter is incremented. If the message length is appropriate, then the appropriate command counter is incremented.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The size, in bytes, that the specified message should be equal to.
